desc: Meraki Floral Co. is about celebrating the everyday. Simply, completely, and with soul. We are about people, moments, and learning to embrace the natural pace of life. We provide curated flowers and retail products to help you do the same. Please join us in building something that truly celebrates the everyday.

layout.text: Offering local deliveries, events, curated gift boxes, retail, Sympathy and classes.

Pick up will be from 11am-3pm, if you can call or text our shop before arrival we woud be happy to run it out to you if needed. You can order on our website, by calling in 435-999-4689 or by stopping by! We look forward to seeing you in the shop. XO
